title: New Tattoo
body:
Hi Guys! So, I'm a tattooist, and I love LOL, even if I don't play that much these days(not much time).
So, I've always loved Ziggs and it's been a longtime since I decided to get a tattoo of him. Now, finally I got a good friend of mine to do it on me. Hope you enjoy it ;)    

Cheers

Steve

replies.body: Woah, this is some serious dedication! Your tattoo artist definitely captured Ziggs well. Beautifully done!  ^-^
Awesome line work, where is his shop?

That's some bomb ink :D


...I'll be leaving now

Nice tattoo
and damn that arm (/ 'P')/ <3
Hey, do you have any ideas for good Soraka or Lissandra tattoos? I plan to get one soon but I had no idea what to go by and those two champs are the most important to me. Help?
Looks nice, but not enough teeth :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=1pUEg0AE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-31T16:54:35.247+0000)
>
> Woah, this is some serious dedication! Your tattoo artist definitely captured Ziggs well. Beautifully done!  ^-^

What they said.

>So, I've always loved Ziggs and it's been a longtime since I decided to get a tattoo of him. 

So wait. You have more than one?

--------------------

Also, my usual response to these topics:
Now for the awkward part: 20 years from now, explaining Ziggs to a bunch of youths that have never heard of LoL.
